text: The Return of the Living Dead is a 1985 American zombie comedy movie directed by Dan O'Bannon and starring Clu Gulager, James Karen, Thom Matthews, Don Calfa. It is set as a sequel to the 1968 movie Night of the Living Dead and was distributed by Orion Pictures. It was nominated for four Saturn Awards in 1986. == Other websites == * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1985 horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:Zombie movies Category:American independent movies
title: The Return of the Living Dead
